T5.TimeLord

Time utilities for T5, will probably be moved out to it's own library as it really doesn't fit here...

Module Functions

increase(duration*)

This function is used to return a new duration that is the sum of the duration values passed to the function.

formatDuration(duration)

This function is used to format the specified duration as a string value
